data.title: Kelly LeVasseur Honored With the “Top 50 Tech Visionaries” Award at InterCon, Las Vegas 2019
data.meta_description: Las Vegas, Nevada — July 05, 2019 — Kelly LeVasseur was conferred with the “Top 50 Tech Visionaries” award for her significant contributions towards the technology sector at InterCon 2019, held at…
data.text:
Las Vegas, Nevada — July 05, 2019 — Kelly LeVasseur was conferred with the “Top 50 Tech Visionaries” award for her significant contributions towards the technology sector at InterCon 2019, held at Caesars Palace, Las Vegas, on June 18–20, 2019.

Kelly LeVasseur is Vice President of Content Strategy at GeistM, a leading multi-channel content delivery engine. Kelly oversees content creation and is responsible for innovating industry-changing strategies in content marketing for Fortune 100 brands. Using GeistM’s technology, Blackfire, Kelly’s team leverages performance data to tell engaging stories by connecting a target audience with messaging that converts results in customer acquisition at scale. Kelly’s team has created over 60 styles of proven content and works closely with 100+ digital publishers to maximize distribution. Previously, Kelly was Vice President of Strategic Development, overseeing a team that worked closely with hyper-growth start-ups, building successful full-funnel campaigns from the ground up.

When asked about her vision and the ways in which she’s planning to reach there, Kelly LeVasseur said, “Anything that we have learned from data and our technology tells us that we can build it into case studies, message matches and just really help with more strategic insights.” Her views about InterCon were, “It’s been great, a lot of insightful speakers. Yesterday there was a really good talk about Saas platform and transforming your company into the Saas model, which a lot of people seem to be doing these days.”

Prior to GeistM, Kelly was a Vice President of Ad Products & Business Development at Loverly, Director of Ad Operations at Hopstop (acquired by Apple), and Account Executive at Quigo Technologies (acquired by AOL).

Intercon 2019, a subsidiary of Prism Events, aims to bring together the brightest minds of the industry that have made significant contributions in the realm of technology. We offer a global platform which accolades the unparalleled efforts of entrepreneurs, tech enthusiasts, and thought leaders. After the success of InterCon 2019, Las Vegas, we are planning to expand our horizons in Middle-East and Asia Pacific.

For more details on InterCon — The Internet Conference, Visit www.intercon.world
